title: Healthline Nutrition — Weight Management
summary: The article provides science-backed support, tools, and guides for weight management, including weight loss tips, dietary suggestions, and exercises. It addresses topics like calorie counting, metabolism, and benefits of mindful eating, targeting those looking to manage or lose weight sustainably. The article does not focus on a specific disease but rather on lifestyle and dietary management for optimal weight and health.

**Description**: No matter what your goals are, we've got the science-backed support, tools, and guides to help you meet them.
